name: ntp-guru
body:
### first explorations
- which ntp server?  ntpd, openntpd, chronyd?
- to docker or not to docker?
- exploring godaddy's DNS offering

### inspiration
- [pool.ntp.org](http://www.pool.ntp.org/en/)

### authors and contributors
I am @tobybot11
